products.title: Disney Minnie Roller Blind
products.description: Liven up your childs bedroom with one of their disney roller blinds, 100% blackout to help ensure a great nights sleep, and in a range of classic prints that'll help make bedtime something to look forward to. As standard all of their blinds are child safe coming with a clear clip to hold the chain taught and agaisnt the wall so there are no free-hanging cords. Being a blackout fabric makes this blind perfect for bedrooms where you need darkness to help give your child the best night sleep possible.

products.title: Sakura Primrose Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: A stunning oriental-inspired patterned fabric, sakura features delicate blossoms on twisting branches. A show-stopper with soft splashes of colour, perfect for kitchens or conservatories. Product id: db-pls0135 fabric colour: primrose material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric. Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes sakura primrose pleated skylight blind in yellow.

products.title: Roller, 4159 Bright Red - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Semi-transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Luxa, Cameo - Vista Blind
products.description: Luxa cameo celebrates the beauty and simplicity that arises when crisp and clean lines are used to create a uniquely modern aesthetic. A brilliant white fabric is the backdrop your eye sees through the delicate voile panelling that hangs so effortlessly in front of it. Adding cameo to the kitchen or dinning room will allow you to introduce some modern form and functionality that will perfectly accentuate your existing decor.

products.title: Luxa, Cream - Vista Blind
products.description: Natura cream breathes life into any modern decorated home by celebrating the interplay between fabric and light. A finely crafted voile is applied with care to a gently shaded cream fabric which is soft to the touch. With different shades flowing effortlessly into one another cream allows you to see something different every time you look at it. Give your living room a modern take on the country style of decor by pairing natura cream with stone grey items such as a rug in front of the fire or a selection of scatter cushions on the sofa.

products.title: Luxa, White - Vista Blind
products.description: Every square inch of luxa white shimmers in the sunlight as it serves as the perfect transition between light and shade. With a finely woven fabric accompanied by a delicate voile to offer you complete control of ambience and light, luxa white allows you to create the perfect environment to suit your mood. Crisp and clean, the modern lines of luxa white make it ideal for the modern fitted bathroom where you can add an understated feature that won't confront your existing decor.

products.title: Galaxy Solar Blackout Ecru Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Galaxy solar is the range of blinds made from pleated fabric that will add more texture to your room. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. Product id: db-pls0040 fabric colour: ecru material: 100% polyester lining: pattern match backing headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Lexington Onyx Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
